question.question: What is the primary purpose of photography/video in the context of peripheral facial paralysis (PFP)?
question.option_a: To diagnose PFP through visual examination
question.option_b: To document the progression of PFP over time
question.option_c: To provide a visual aid for patients to understand their condition
question.option_d: To capture the facial expressions of patients with PFP for research purposes
